27016.title: Oct 9 - Saskatoon (Nutana) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
27016.summary:
Affected Area: Saskatoon (Nutana)

Affected Services: Internet, Business Internet, Phone, Business Phone, Digital TV, VOD, Gateway, BlueCurve TV, WiFi Access Points

Reference Number: CHG0290911

Summary: Some customers in the Nutana area of Saskatoon are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Live Updates:

10/09/2020 15:06 CST Technicans are dispatched to arrive on-site to investigate.
10/09/2020 14:35 CST We're looking into it. Stay tuned for updates.
